title: The Zashiki Warashi of Intellectual Village - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Harem   Mystery   Sci-fi   Shounen   Supernatural
tags: Clever Protagonist   Crime   Folklore   Male Protagonist   Multiple Protagonists   Older Love Interests   Secret Organizations   Youkai
author: Kamachi Kazuma   鎌池和馬
description:
Intellectual Villages are old fashioned rural villages recreated with cutting edge technology. Those villages attract the Japanese monsters known as Youkai.

The high school boy Jinnai Shinobu lives in one of those villages and has a Zashiki Warashi living in his house. He tends to run across Youkai with unnerving frequency and this often leads to trouble for him.>
